title: Web Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Technology Integration Instruction Through Music Design: TPCK-Based Affective Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently apply the TPACK framework to design instruction integrating music content, technological tools, and cognitive/affective domains at least three times
Learners can create musical compositions using digital tools like MuseScore and develop at least two types of instructional materials linking them to emotional expression
Learners can execute technology-based music instruction interaction strategies for large classes in VR simulation environments with at least 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
